column4: I love Ubuntu... it's helped me switch 3 of my friends to Mac OS X. Thanks, guys!
: Ubuntu has switched people to OS X???  How does that make Ubuntu look good?
I admit, I have an iBook which I dual boot with, and OS X is good.....but that is insane

Axe_: Ubuntu showed them that Windows wasn't all it was cracked up to be. They wouldn't look at the Mac OS, they were too biased against it being "gay" and "slow" and "crap". Ubuntu was a stepping stone.
